name: Bike Rider - Free Style Racing
description:
Are you looking for a crazy bike riding action? You found the right game for you.

Bike Rider is xtreme BMX game with insane stunt action! Win the race as you drive through a variety of dangerous tracks and obstacles while enjoying the realistic bike physics and smooth gameplay.

Bike Rider will keep you occupied for hours. It is easy to play but hard to gain the control over off-road bikes. Race, jump and crash your way through this motocross race. Try to keep your head on the shoulders.

Game Features:
- more than 30 levels from easy trials to extreme,
- realistic 3D physics and feel good graphics,
- Select from several unique bikes,
- Ride without limits
